OrgName.entry: LONGLEY LINK TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

AltName.entry: LONGLEY TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: A voluntary group which aims to look after the interests of the tenants and residents in Longley. Actively seeking new members. Organises a family funday once or twice a year.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Tues in the month 4.30-6.30pm (liaison meeting with Sheffield Homes followed by tenants' and residents' meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
